column2: The "Aristo" theme for Cappuccino ported to a jQuery UI Theme

column5: message
Added support for 1.9-1.10 (closes #53 #54)

Merge pull request #52 from krische/master

Added support for jQuery UI 1.9
accidentally missed one class with 1.8 support

Add support back in for jQueryUI 1.8

I realized I removed the classes that were used by jQueryUI 1.8, so this should now match the tabs for 1.8 and 1.9
update menu item highlighting for jQueryUI 1.9
update tabs classes for jQueryUI 1.9
updated licensing + css3 anims now work cross browser

Merge pull request #50 from mmeisel/patch-1

Add missing CSS3 box-shadow for firefox 13

Merge pull request #48 from lthibodeaux/master

Input Tag Buttons Have Normal Font Weight When Inside Widgets
Update master

Merge pull request #45 from talltroym/master

Really fixes issue #44 this time
fix white 1px from showing when hovering over current date in date picker, which has a border.

Merge pull request #43 from talltroym/master

Fix for the current date not being indicated on the calendar
Fixes issue #32 where a defaultDate value passed into the date-picker would not be displayed to the user as highlighted
Fixes issue #42, when no value is entered into the input field and the date picker is opened, the current date is not highlighted
Renamed CSS file to remove irrelevant version number
Closes GitHub issues #29 and #40, and adds CSS3 gradients as per #34
Added a style exception for input[type=range] + renamed demo.html to index.html for easier master/gh-pages sync
Autocomplete dropdown appears ABOVE slider handles as always, but now also works inside of dialogs.
Pull request didn't completely fix the issue, added white background to tab content

Merge pull request #33 from disfated/patch-1

.ui-tabs -> background: transparent;
.ui-tabs -> background: transparent;
Removed Helvetica from font tree to fix Windows/OS X discrepancy.
Left over selector was breaking stuff in webkit
Ran into some cross browser problems, fixed aside from button styles between IE8 and IE9
better sandboxing of submit button styles
Improved support for Opera (some properties only had vendor prefixes, not global ones) + submit button styling + sandboxing of form input styles

Removed # toplink on "Change" buttons + styled input/textarea fields + css3 hover transitions + user-select:none on buttons + slider/autocomplete handle z-index + background bleed through progress bar bug
converting to new theme base and resolving logged issues
fixed: pointing to jquery 1.4.3 and 1.8.5 Google CDN. Updated path to new css file
Removed old file name
Merged AgustCo's UI 1.8.5 changes
Updated Buttons for jQuery UI 1.8.5
added demos for combinations: buttons inside dialog, accordion and tabs
fix for issue 6: ui-state-default inside a Tab widget gets same style as the tab nav buttons
fix for issue 7: border around buttons inside dialog and accordion
fix for issue 5: wrong icon in button when in accordion
fix for issue 8: button in dialog will have wrong icon when you hover over this button
